topics.body:
Okay, Gunbuster may have had fanservice, but it wasn't even a thing before Gunbuster. (And it was actually tasteful unlike that anime based on how you're describing it.)

It also had hard science, Some really memorable characters, And a kind of plot that hasn't really been tackled before in japanese media.
